seniority_level.evidence: 5-7 years of experience required, title 'Application Developer-Process Management' implies senior-level responsibility in BPM domain

job_family.evidence: Job description explicitly states 'As an Data Engineer at IBM' and responsibilities include data gathering, storage, and processing

sub_specialty.evidence: Focus on BPM workflows, process automation, and integration with ERP/CRM systems suggests batch-oriented ETL and orchestration rather than real-time streaming

leadership_expectation.evidence: No mention of managing teams or mentoring; responsibilities focus on individual technical delivery and collaboration with stakeholders

primary_cloud.evidence: No cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP) mentioned in job description or Pass 1 extraction

secondary_clouds.evidence: No cloud platforms mentioned at all

processing_paradigm.evidence: Emphasis on BPM workflows, process automation, and integration with enterprise systems suggests batch-oriented processing rather than real-time

orchestrator_category.evidence: No orchestration tools like Airflow, Dagster, or cloud-native orchestrators mentioned

storage_layer.evidence: No specific storage systems (warehouse, lake, lakehouse) mentioned beyond general database concepts

remote_restriction.evidence: Location specified as 'Bengaluru East, Karnataka, India' and work model is 'onsite' per Pass 1

timezone_focus.evidence: Location restricted to India (IN) per geo_restriction_type and allowed_countries in Pass 1

relocation_required.evidence: Onsite work model and specific location in Bengaluru implies relocation may be required for non-local candidates

h1b_friendly.evidence: No visa sponsorship mentioned; location restricted to India suggests local hiring only

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: No mention of student visas; onsite role in India implies local work authorization required

citizenship_required.evidence: Location restricted to India implies authorization to work in India is required, but no citizenship requirement stated

w2_vs_1099.evidence: Employment type is 'full_time' and 'permanent' per Pass 1, suggesting W2 employee status

benefits_level.evidence: No benefits listed in Pass 1 extraction or job description

growth_path_clarity.evidence: No mention of career tracks, promotion paths, or advancement opportunities in job description or Pass 1

mentorship_signals.evidence: No mention of mentorship programs, assigned mentors, or working with senior staff

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No mention of promotions, advancement, or career progression in job description or Pass 1

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No mention of internal transfers, lateral moves, or exploring other roles

career_tracks_available.evidence: No career tracks (IC, management, specialist, architect) mentioned

requirement_strictness.evidence: All skills listed are 'must have' with no 'nice to have' skills; specific tool requirements (Appian, BPM tools, databases) and 5-7 years experience

scope_definition.evidence: Focused on BPM application development, troubleshooting, and integration; responsibilities are well-defined around process management

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: 5-7 years experience aligns with senior-level expectations; skills are specific to BPM domain and not overly broad
